# kup-image-button



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property              | Attribute               | Description                                               | Type      | Default |
| --------------------- | ----------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `allowMultiSelection` | `allow-multi-selection` | If enabled, can select one or more images                 | `boolean` | `false` |
| `images`              | --                      | urls of the images                                        | `Image[]` | `[]`    |
| `showDescription`     | `show-description`      | If enabled, display the image description below the image | `boolean` | `false` |
| `size`                | `size`                  | image dimension                                           | `number`  | `64`    |
